entry.title: FOG ADVISORY , Burlington
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:29 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -0.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Burlington Lift Bridge 03:00 AM EST Monday 13 February 2023
Temperature: -0.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.8 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -2
Dewpoint: -3.1°C
Wind: WSW 2 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Sunday night: Clear. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: Clear. Fog patches developing late this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of rain showers or flurries. High 7. POP 40%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries late in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the morning then northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 7 in the morning. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 4. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries early in the evening then 40 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 7 overnight. Forecast issued 10:33 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
